Fantasy 











 





Not-so superstars
 




Catcher Michael Barrett makes a repeat appearance. (US Presswire)



    

    

      
      The All-Star rosters are set, which means it's time for Scott Miller's 
      eighth annual Anti-All 
      Star team. It's a dubious list of misfit boys -- and a surprise misfit 
      girl -- that you won't be seeing at the Midsummer Classic.
    

  
Full story Related Links:• AL vote: Okajima | NL: Young | Oswalt subs | Bonds to skip HR Derby• Fantasy | Miller's picks: AL | NL | Love Letters | Short Hops | Blog | Yo!• All-Star: Rosters | Snubs | Voting | Results, MVPs | SPiN: Maul-Stars


 


 

 





 Game of the Night: Beckett, Crisp blast lowly Devil Rays


    

      
      Josh Beckett earns his 12th win and Coco 
      Crisp hits a GS as Boston manhandles Tampa Bay 15-4 to 
      complete the series sweep. The Rays have lost 11 consecutive games.
    

  
• BOS: Okajima in ASG | Beckett profile | Win leaders


 

 





 Mejia: Carlesimo has shot at salvation with SuperSonics


    

      
      Known best for being infamously choked out in Golden State, coach P.J. 
      Carlesimo will have 
      an opportunity in Seattle to finally shed that 'tyrant' label once and 
      for all.
